greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = smallest k>=2 such that n divides Fibonacci(k-1)+2
comment: 0 is inserted if no such k exists.
example: n=1 divides F(0)+2=2. n=2 divides F(0)+2=2. n=3 divides F(1)+2=3. n=4 divides F(3)+2=4.
program: (PARI) a(n) = {k = 2; while (((fibonacci(k-1)+2) % n), k++; if (k > 6*n+2 , return(0));); return (k);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 30 2013
results.author: _Art DuPre_, Aug 03 2012
